pkgmetadata.longdescription: Add Trendline and Confidence Interval of Basic Regression Models to Plot // Plot, draw regression line and confidence interval, and show regression equation, R-square and P-value, as simple as possible, by using different models ("line2P", "line3P", "log2P", "exp2P", "exp3P", "power2P", "power3P") built in the 'trendline()' function.
